content: wrap yourself in the cozy elegance of the maeve cardigan featuring a beautiful textured stitch and a relaxed loose fit that s perfect for layering with roomy pockets and an easy-to-follow pattern it s as fun to crochet as it is to wear the pattern includes a video tutorial and pairs perfectly with its sister knit design for a matching fall look the maeve cardigan is free on my blog 1 **a make along featuring the maeve cardigan and the marigold cardigan knit design by meghanmakesdo will begin on october 1st 2024 ** the maeve cardigan is a kit with lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn needed to make your cardigan plus a free copy of the pdf digital download of the pattern you can also customize your yarn color a full video tutorial is also available 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-maeve-cardigan-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/4obxf 3 https //youtu be/cg1c6jkxmpq
